seller_description: The 33KM/H Speedy 1:12 RC Car is an off-road monster truck that delivers thrilling racing experiences with its powerful RC 380 motor, reaching speeds of up to 33 km/h. It features a 2.4GHz remote controller with a control distance of 50 meters, ensuring a lag-free racing experience. The car's ABS chassis and aluminium alloy body provide exceptional durability, impact resistance, and reduced weight, making it perfect for rough terrain. Equipped with LED headlights and chassis lights, this realistic RC truck lights up the road for nighttime adventures. Powered by a 7.4V 1400mAh Li-ion rechargeable battery (2 batteries included), it offers up to 70 minutes of continuous playtime (35 minutes per battery). This RC car makes a perfect gift for birthdays and special occasions, offering endless fun for both kids and adults.
review: The battery life falls short of the promised 35 minutes, lasting only about 20 minutes per charge.
Expected-output: The buyer is dissatisfied because the actual battery performance does not align with the advertised claim, placing the fault on the seller for inaccurate specifications.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
